circumstances: On final approach to Along Airport, during the last segment, the copilot-in-command failed to realize that his altitude was insufficient. The airplane struck a fence, stalled and crashed in flames short of runway threshold. All seven occupants were rescued while the aircraft was partially destroyed by fire.
probable_cause: The accident is attributed to the copilot's failure to effect a safe landing. The captain was not authorized to permit a landing by the copilot.
